item.description: Harold Parker is easy to find. Take 128 North or South to exit 25B onto 114 West. Once you are on 114, the entrance to the park is 9 miles down on the left. Look for a MLUSA Sign. Go to the end of the road and take a left. The ranger station is just a short way down on the left. There is plenty of parking and bathroom facilities as well as trail maps. Be sure to bring a basket with a handle, mosquito repellant,  water to hydrate yourself,and sturdy shoes. Rain date will be Sunday Sept 25th. Hope to see you there.
item.how_to_find_us: Harold Parker is off 114 West in North Andover
item.name: Cancelled due to rain. Rain date is Sunday Sept. 25th @ 10:30 am
